function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Urban primacy contributes to disease diffusion","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Improving connectivity and accessibility of smaller settlements","Technologies":"Urban planning, transportation infrastructure","People":"Inhabitants of poorly connected urban systems","Owner":"Urban planners, government authorities"},{"Description":"Hierarchical connectivity between settlements increases disease transmission","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission between settlements","Mitigation":"Improving transportation networks and promoting decentralized urban development","Technologies":"Connectivity modeling, urban design strategies","People":"Residents of connected settlements, travelers","Owner":"Urban developers, local authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of accessibility of smaller settlements contributes to disease diffusion","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread in isolated areas","Mitigation":"Improving accessibility through road infrastructure and public transportation","Technologies":"Road construction, public transportation systems","People":"Residents of smaller settlements","Owner":"Transportation authorities, local government"}]}
